quote: He said he has had enough of the bullying of his children and if nothing was done he would kill his children and himself
He told me the cleaner had grabbed him in the groin
Recreation tent was covered in food scraps, rubbish and dirt. Children had no chairs to sit on and no tables … no water'
He informed me that a CSO had choked his son
Parents and children have been spoken to regarding breaking into storage tent and stealing
Today is the anniversary of the day they lost their child to drowning whilst attempting to get to Australia
She reported she had a Nauruan CSO attempted to hug and kiss her and invite her to a "sexy party"
Client very scared now of Nauru community and fears she will be raped if released to Nauruan community
Staff entered tea room where a large amount of consumables that had been there the day before were no longer there
Child was sucking a lollypop, when asked where she got it from, child said an officer … four children with lollypops, all female
I said to her what about your children, what will happen to them. She said she will kill them first and then herself
Today we only have 20 students out of 50 in secondary school. They are not coming as a show of protest
One asylum seeker is trying to organise a mass suicide. She stated that at last count there are at least 30 people who are willing to take part
Asylum seekers advise they have been on a hunger strike for many days
She stated she will make sure the media knows the truth about what goes on here in Nauru
He then began to say he will report SCA to immigration, Guardian, ABC … he was asked to lower his voice
She handed the rope to the case manager saying she had considered using this to strangle herself
He then said do I have to kill myself to go to Australia?
She began to vomit. A strong smell of bleach was detected. A code blue was called
He informed the staff that he will not eat or drink anything until he gets to Australia
She disclosed that she had had sex while in the community and that it had not been consensual
Advised that they are already refugees in 3 countries. If they are not believed now they can be returned to where they found them, in the ocean
He said: "When I see that my sister is OK or getting appropriate support, I will be OK"
She spoke about the image of the deceased Syrian child on the world news and that she and her unborn baby would be next
She stated "if I am made to have my baby on Nauru I will have my baby in my tent and kill myself and my baby"
